title: A Bad Attitude: A novel from the Vietnam War
description: Meet Farnsworthreluctant soldier and world-class slacker... but is he also a cold-blooded murderer? And if he didn't kill the sadistic Sergeant Bragg, who did?See the other side of the Vietnam Draftees versus lifers, the Saigon black market, deteriorating race relations, and the deadly 1968 race riot at Long Binh Jail.
author: Dennis Mansker
